price: Ta ce: "A inã yãro zai kasance a gare ni alhãli kuwa wani mutum bai shãfe ni ba, kuma ban kasance kãruwa ba?"
arabic: قَالَتۡ أَنَّىٰ يَكُونُ لِي غُلَٰمٞ وَلَمۡ يَمۡسَسۡنِي بَشَرٞ وَلَمۡ أَكُ بَغِيّٗا

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: qālat annā yakūnu lī ghulāmun walam yamsasnī basharun walam aku baghiyyan
